metas.name: Klaus
metas.description: A heartwarming animated Christmas story with beautiful animation and a unique take on Santa Claus, similar to the magical feel of Ghibli films.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: An exciting adventure with a bond between a boy and a dragon, offering both humor and heartwarming moments like 'Tangled' and 'Brave'.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the epic adventure and emotional journey of Hiccup and Toothless, with stunning animation and engaging storytelling.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The concluding chapter of the 'How to Train Your Dragon' saga, offering a visually spectacular and emotionally resonant finale.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A delightful and charming live-action comedy about a polite bear, filled with gentle humor and adventure, reminiscent of the family-friendly comedy of 'Wallace & Gromit'.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: An even more beloved sequel, it's a joyous and perfectly crafted family film with plenty of wit and heart, similar to the positive spirit of 'The Bad Guys'.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and visually inventive animated adventure about a quirky family on a road trip that turns into a robot apocalypse, with the same zany energy as 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A vibrant and musical animated film about a magical Colombian family, with themes of belonging and self-discovery that resonate with 'Coco'.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: An inspiring animated adventure about a young woman who sets sail to save her people, featuring stunning visuals and memorable songs like 'Sing'.

metas.name: The Lego Movie
metas.description: A wildly creative and funny animated adventure that's surprisingly smart, with a sense of fun and adventure akin to 'The Bad Guys'.

metas.name: Rio
metas.description: A colorful and upbeat animated musical adventure set in Brazil, with engaging characters and a fun soundtrack, similar to 'Sing'.

metas.name: Rio 2
metas.description: Continues the vibrant musical adventure with new characters and challenges, maintaining the fun and energy of the first film.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
metas.description: A charming stop-motion animated comedy with no dialogue, relying on visual gags and situational humor, much like 'Wallace & Gromit'.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
metas.description: Another delightful adventure for Shaun and his flock, this time involving an alien, offering plenty of laughs and gentle thrills.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: A visually groundbreaking animated superhero film with a fantastic story and incredible art style, appealing to fans of adventure and strong characters.

metas.name: Kubo and the Two Strings
metas.description: A visually stunning stop-motion animated fantasy adventure with a compelling story and beautiful music, sharing the magical feel of Ghibli films.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: A clever and funny animated film about how Santa delivers presents, offering a unique and entertaining take on a classic story, with a similar charm to 'Paddington'.

metas.name: Megamind
metas.description: A witty and action-packed animated comedy about a supervillain who gets bored, with great voice acting and a fun story, similar to 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A hilarious animated comedy about a supervillain and his three adopted daughters, with a lot of heart and memorable characters.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Continues the adventures of Gru and the Minions with more laughs and heartwarming moments, maintaining the family-friendly comedy aspect.

metas.name: ParaNorman
metas.description: A delightful stop-motion animated comedy horror film that's spooky but not truly scary, with a strong message about understanding and bravery, similar to the adventurous spirit in some Ghibli films.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A beautifully animated French film about an unlikely friendship between a bear and a mouse, with a gentle charm and heartwarming story.

metas.name: The Illusionist
metas.description: A poignant and beautifully animated French film about a magician, with a quiet charm and melancholic beauty that might appeal to fans of Ghibli's more thoughtful works.

metas.name: Mary and the Witch's Flower
metas.description: From Studio Ponoc (founded by former Ghibli animators), this film has a similar magical and adventurous feel to early Ghibli films like 'Ponyo'.

metas.name: The Red Turtle
metas.description: A visually unique and dialogue-free animated film with a fable-like quality, offering a contemplative and beautiful experience, echoing the artistic depth of Ghibli.

metas.name: Song of the Sea
metas.description: A visually stunning Irish animated film with a rich mythology and a beautiful story about family and magic, reminiscent of Ghibli's fantasy elements.

metas.name: Wolfwalkers
metas.description: Another gorgeous animated film from Cartoon Saloon, this one is an exhilarating adventure with a strong folklore element and themes of friendship.

metas.name: A Cat in Paris
metas.description: A stylish and adventurous animated film set in Paris, with a unique art style and a fun heist-like plot.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A classic Disney animated musical adventure with jazz-age flair and a strong female lead, offering a similar blend of music and adventure to 'Tangled'.

metas.name: Big Hero 6
metas.description: A Marvel-inspired animated adventure with a blend of action, humor, and a touching story about friendship and grief.

metas.name: Raya and the Last Dragon
metas.description: An epic animated adventure set in a fantasy world, with themes of trust and bravery, similar to 'Brave' and 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and visually inventive animated adventure about a quirky family on a road trip that turns into a robot apocalypse, with the same zany energy as 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and visually inventive animated adventure about a quirky family on a road trip that turns into a robot apocalypse, with the same zany energy as 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: Abominable
metas.description: A charming animated adventure about a girl who finds a yeti and embarks on a journey to reunite him with his family, with a focus on friendship and travel.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A fun and inventive stop-motion animated adventure comedy about chickens trying to escape their farm, with the same ingenuity as 'Wallace & Gromit'.

metas.name: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget
metas.description: The long-awaited sequel to 'Chicken Run,' offering more thrilling escapes and humorous antics from the plucky flock.

metas.name: The Wild
metas.description: An animated adventure comedy about zoo animals trying to get back home, with a focus on teamwork and overcoming challenges.

metas.name: Open Season
metas.description: A lighthearted animated comedy about two unlikely animal friends who must band together to get back to the wild.

metas.name: Open Season 2
metas.description: Continues the comedic adventures of the forest animals, with more slapstick humor and family-friendly antics.

metas.name: Open Season 3
metas.description: The third installment in the 'Open Season' series, offering more animated animal hijinks and lighthearted fun.
